rules: Rule1: Provided that sensors are calibrated, if growth algorithms are optimized, then solar panels are installed in the greenhouse.
Rule2: Whenever the maintenance team is scheduled, then if the aquaponics system is operational, the lighting system is energy efficient.
Rule3: The maintenance team is scheduled or the diagnostics system is automated.
Rule4: The pump system has malfunctioned or, provided that the diagnostics system is automated, then if the aquaponics system is operational, the lighting system is energy efficient.
Rule5: If leak detection is repaired, then it is not the case that the pump system has malfunctioned.
Rule6: Supply delivery is delayed or leak detection is repaired.
Rule7: Whenever shipping is expedited, then supply delivery is not delayed.
Rule8: Either certification is pending or shipping is expedited.
Rule9: If organic certification is obtained, then certification is not pending.
Rule10: If the aquaponics system is operational, then water quality is stable.
Rule11: If the aquaponics system is operational, then climate control is automated.
Rule12: If pH monitors are calibrated, then whenever water quality is stable, water recycling is functional.
Rule13: Either pH monitors are calibrated or nutrient levels are adjusted.
Rule14: If nutrient levels are adjusted, then the ecosystem is balanced.
Rule15: Provided that the ecosystem is balanced, then whenever water quality is stable, water recycling is functional.
Rule16: Whenever the environmental audit is passed, then safety protocols are not compliant.
Rule17: Provided that operators are certified, then if the environmental audit is passed, safety protocols are compliant.
Rule18: If operating procedures are updated, then operators are certified.
Rule19: Under the condition that water recycling is functional, then if government funding is not secured, solar panels are installed in the greenhouse.
Rule20: Performance review is completed or, provided that it is not the case that if technical staff are trained then operating procedures are updated, then compliance documents are not reviewed.
Rule21: If the lighting system is energy efficient, then water recycling is functional.
Rule22: Whenever climate control is automated, the lighting system is energy efficient.
Rule23: Provided that it is not the case that if technical staff are trained then operating procedures are updated, then compliance documents are reviewed.
Rule24: If it is not the case that if the construction phase is completed then safety inspection is not approved, then backup power is operational.
Rule25: Whenever it is not the case that if the construction phase is completed then safety inspection is not approved, then backup power is not operational.

Rule26: Under the condition that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if government funding is not secured then the project grant is not funded then safety inspection is not approved then regulatory standards are not being met, then the environmental audit is passed.

Rule27: Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if government funding is not secured then the project grant is not funded then safety inspection is not approved, then regulatory standards are being met.
Rule28: Under the condition that it is not the case that if government funding is not secured then the project grant is not funded, then safety inspection is approved.
Rule29: Whenever it is not the case that if government funding is not secured then the project grant is not funded, then the construction phase is completed.
Rule30: Under the condition that government funding is not secured, then growth algorithms are optimized.
Rule31: Whenever government funding is not secured, the project grant is funded.
Rule32: Provided that government funding is not secured, then solar panels are not installed in the greenhouse.
facts: Fact3: The aquaponics system is operational.
Fact5: Performance review is not completed.
